{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2505.05243v1", "title": "Power $Σ_1$ in Card with two Woodin cardinals", "summary": "V\"a\"an\"anen and Welch asked in the paper "When cardinals determine the
power set: inner models and H\"artig quantifier logic" which large cardinals
are consistent with the power set operation $x\mapsto P(x)$ being
$\Sigma_1$-definable in the predicate Card of all cardinals. We show that,
relative to large cardinals, this property is consistent with the existence of
two Woodin cardinals.", "main_category": "math.LO", "categories": "math.LO", "published": "2025-05-08T13:42:01Z"}
